page.title: 03CLUBS CONT
page.content:
collects from outlying parts, the voluntary driver and conductor being supplied by the club. The W.R.V.S subsidises the meals and the minibus. Organisers: Miss J. Burnett, Mrs. E. Rolls.
YOUTH CLUB: Meets weekly in Bishops Frome Village Hall during the winter, offering opportunities for sport and recreation. Leader: Mr. L. Anthony
PLAYGROUP: Meets weekly in Fromes Hill Village Hall. Mothers take pre-school children for two hours every Tuesday.
FOOTBALL CLUB: Formed in July l985, the Bishops Frome A.F.C. has 33 players. Chairmen: Mr. M. Hancocks, Mr. B. Roberts.
CRICKET CLUB: Bishops Frome C.C plays
